ygData.subject: Re: Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
ygData.msgSnippet: For armor your best bet is anything that raises yer int... We are not melee types so go for the more mana...
ygData.messageBody:
For armor your best bet is anything that raises yer int... We are not melee
types so go for the more mana...


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
>Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 10:21:52 -0500
>
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>I picked up a bloodclaw stilletto at the bazaar this past week, from what I
>can tell, it's basically a 20 damage effect, not sure if it stuns or
>anything else. For armor, I'm mostly wearing woven, with a Gossamer robe
>as
>well, I wore a velvet choker for a while, until I got my blackened
>medallion, savants cap for headwear, damask shoulders, polar bear cloak
>(heavy, but that resist cold comes in real handy fighting wizard type mobs)
>bearskin belt, and the ever popular fur lined shoes. Guk isn't *too* bad
>if
>you're in a party, but soloing is just out of the question until a much
>higher level.
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: <dualdocs@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 10:16 AM
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
>
>
> > From: dualdocs@...
> >
> > Greetings!
> >
> > I just obtained a stilleto of the bloodclaw and was curious if anyone
>knew
>what the bloodclaw effect actually was. When I hit with it i do normal
>piercing damage but have only seen what may be a special effect one- " the
>Aviak Rook screams in pain" after I hit but I couldnt tell what the effect
>was.
> >
> > Also, I am level 20 now and equiped with a gossamer robe, a skull of
>Jen'tar, a dagger of marnek and a smattering of cloth, woven and netted
>armor. What is the best way to increase AC. Go to all gossamer? or is
>there
>something better? Im reluctant to hit Guk as it is not a dungeon tuned for
>pet wielding characters so any suggestions?
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Grymspine Mael'fesience
> > Level 20 Dark Elf Necromancer
> > Mithaniel Marr
> >
